conbody.p: Created reusablecontentlibrary.dita file where I placed all images used in the document using conref
Created safety.dita file with hazard statements which are reused in "Open Virtual Appliance (OVA) configuration requirements" and Deploying the virtual appliances
Createdsecondarymap to create keys for elements above
created internal links which are dummy because they were leading to content which was removed. They all go to "About this publication"
Created val1 file with conditional processing
